column2:
"A story from ten years ago?
Why out of the blue?
*Sighs* Fine, umm..."

"Speaking of ten years ago, ah THAT one.
That's around the time I met my Teacher.
Teacher really was amazing."
"1. Stare at him."
"2. Give out Melrondia's name."

"Geez, I know alright.
I'll tell you everything, so stop staring at me like that.
Feels like Teacher is staring at me right now..."

"That name...
Did she tell you herself?
In other words, that story..."
"Even so, the story from ten years ago, umm..."

"Oh perfect timing.
Hey Echo! Come here!"

"What Zeno?
I have administrative procedures to go through,
so make it brief."

"Say, do you remember anything
from ten years ago?"

"Ten years ago?
You often skipped training and
keep getting scolded by me."

"Why do you even
remember that part?
Never mind, thanks anyway."

"Alright, don't skip the upcoming meeting.
You, make sure that Zeno sets a good example."

"I can barely recall memories from ten years ago.
I hardly remember anything.
It's like a hazy fog covering it up."

"However, there's only one thing that I won't forget.
Something Gettemhart and I won't forget."

"The Dark Falz that appeared ten years ago.
Once, both of us were fighting during a civil rescue."

"I was in charge of sniping that time.
To be honest, I was in the safest place."

"From there, I saw my comrades collapsing.
All I could do was watch."

"Me, along with Gettemhart,
and the child Melphonsina,
were the only survivors."

"Ah- that's right.
You told me before.
You prefer Melrondria right?"

"Gettemhart and I got lost on
the way. That's when we saw her
older sister, Melphonsina,
sacrificed herself to let Melrondria escape."

"After that you already know.
I threw my gun away and Gettemhart
started acting strange."

"Afterwards, Melrondria tried to
become Melphonsina."

"Now that's, from your senpai's past.
Something like that.
Funny, isn't it?"
"Mmn?\u3000About the Dark Falz we confronted that time?"

"Something I won't forget either.
It was a terrifying and intimidating monster."

"It's appearance was like a child,
playing around like nothing's wrong.
It's something out of the ordinary, THAT."

"Why are you surprised like that?
There aren't any Dark Falz who takes form of a child right?"
